meanings.definition: A person who creates new versions of existing songs by altering or adding to the original recording.
meanings.sent1: The remixers added cool beats to the song.
meanings.sent2: The remixers released a new version of the hit single.
meanings.sent3: The remixers made the song sound like a dance party!
meanings.sent4: The remixers transformed the original track into a catchy tune.
meanings.sent5: The remixers' creativity brought a fresh sound to the music scene.

meanings.definition: Those who modify or adapt something to create a new version or interpretation.
meanings.sent1: The remixers changed the recipe to make a unique dish.
meanings.sent2: The remixers reimagined the classic story with a modern twist.
meanings.sent3: The remixers turned the old furniture into stylish pieces.
meanings.sent4: The remixers reshaped the idea into something innovative.
meanings.sent5: The remixers' adaptation gave a fresh perspective to the project.
